root.name: Test Drive
root.description: GameplayPlayers are challenged to race up a narrow mountain road, avoid the oncoming traffic, and outrun the police. The players can't drive off the road; doing so will result in a collision with a cliff wall or a dive into a cliff drop.LegacyTest Drive is the game that introduced the concept of street racing while outrunning the police. It was also the first real racing game for DOS.CarsLamborghini Countach Lotus Turbo Esprit Porsche 911 Turbo Ferrari Testarossa Chevy Corvette
